data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Hoima to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hoima, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Hoima, Uganda to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Hoima, Uganda and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Hoima, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gujarati people.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Hoima with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: God, guide the 14,950 believers in Hoima to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hoima, Uganda has a population of 45,100.

We estimate Hoima has 14,950 people who might know Jesus, 22,522 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,628 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 14,950 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
